snippet.title: Johnny Depp performs with Hollywood Vampires in Portugal hours after Amber Heard accuses him of dome
snippet.description:
The Alice Through The Looking Glass star ignored Amber's shock allegations as he took to the stage in Lisbon 
Johnny Depp appeared to be in good spirits when he joined his band the Hollywood Vampires on stage on Friday night.
Hours earlier his estranged wife Amber Heard had accused him of domestic violence during a dramatic court hearing which took place five days after she filed for divorce.
Shrugging off the allegations, the actor took to the stage as the legendary group headlined the Rock in Rio Festival at Bela Vista Park in Lisbon, Portugal.
The seven-strong group wowed the crowds before Johnny posed for pictures with his famous bandmates, including Alice Cooper and Joe Perry.
tags: Johnny Depp performs with Hollywood Vampires
